item.title: Custom opkg repository
item.description: The post presenst simple example to create opkg repository to upgrade embbded linux systems using nginx server. The opkg pakcge should be installed as part of the image furing the first instalation. To add opkg to yocto image type type folloing line in file conf/local.conf IMAGE_INSTALL_append = " opkg \ " downlad and install opkg utils: git://git.yoctoproject.org/opkg-utils and create Packages.gz file: cd /path-to-yocto-build/build/tmp/deploy/ipk ~/opkg-utils/opkg-make-index . > Packages.gz install nginx I haved used gentoo system , so inorder to install nginx on gentoo type:
